name: Name
are_you_sure_you_want_to_log_out?: Are you sure you want to log out?
a_team_of_engineers_and_experts_from_dif: A team of engineers and experts from different sectors with a common goal: to promote and develop Madagascar's economy by supporting operators who require our technical assistance.
offering_quality_service_to_our_customer: Offering quality service to our customers. Enabling our customers to bring their projects to fruition and improve existing ones, always with the aim of achieving quality.
highly_competitive_rates,_customizable_o: Highly competitive rates, customizable offers for both individuals and SMEs.
reactive_expert_consultants_available_at: Reactive expert consultants available at all times.
certification_description: KH Consulting supports you in obtaining international certifications such as Organic Agriculture, GLOBAL GAP, and ISO, ensuring rigorous internal controls and audits to guarantee your compliance and excellence.
industrialization_description: KH Consulting guides you in the industrialization of your projects by creating new production plants, optimizing your production lines, and advising you on the acquisition of industrial machines, while ensuring the implementation of quality management systems (QMS) and HACCP, as well as training in GMP/GHP and improving your products.
accompaniment_description: KH Consulting supports exporters in preparing for phytosanitary audits, product quality control, and ensuring compliance of premises and products, while enhancing the customer experience through process, infrastructure, and management optimization.
customer_relationship_management_descrip: KH Consulting optimizes your customer relationship management by conducting satisfaction surveys, performing customer NPS, and helping you draft and implement effective complaint processes.
essential_oils_description: KH Consulting specializes in the production and sale of essential oils, designing distillation stills, product quality control, and sourcing suppliers and clients to maximize your success.
request_description: KH Consulting meets your specific needs by conducting geological and hydrogeological studies, ensuring groundwater drilling and capture, and supporting you in other sectors upon request.
